ygData.subject: RE: Why do so many clerics think they're wizards?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am newly level 20 and I do melee at some times. I would never put my group in perill though. the reason I do it is not to do damage but rather to keep my
ygData.messageBody:
I am newly level 20 and I do melee at some times. I would never put my group
in perill though. the reason I do it is not to do damage but rather to keep
my defense and dodge skills up. It will really come in handy at hight levels
when I do a huge heal and they come after me. I just ask my party members to
let it beat on me for a while, then I back off and let them do their work.

Chrisstauf Healingsoul


>Nope it isnt just you.... I think most clerics from 20 below have some
>kind
>of feeling that we can melee with the rest. I knew I had that feeling till
>I was level 24 and finally realized that my melee just blows compared to
>the
>rest. Give it some time. The more experienced clerics about 20+ will heal
>and buff instead of melee. Its just a phase I wouldnt worry about it to
>much.
>
>Qanin Skywanderer
>The Rathe 27th Circle
>
>
